map.title: map quizzes
map.heroText: Here are my map quizzes, powered by OpenLayers. As you answer, the marker will disappear. Use regex to select the locations you want to include in the quiz.

streak.title: streak quizzes
streak.heroText: Guess the answer based on the prompt! Try to get the highest streak that you can. You can use regex to select the prompts you want to include in the quiz.

compare.title: compare quizzes
compare.heroText: Compare the two items and guess which one has the greater value. Try to get the highest streak that you can.
